lines.text: create long longs a , b , c , d
lines.code: long long a , b , c , d ;

lines.text: read a read b read c read d
if a is greater than b , swap elements a and b
lines.code: if ( a > b ) swap ( a , b ) ;

lines.text: if b is greater than c , swap elements b and c
lines.code: if ( b > c ) swap ( b , c ) ;

lines.text: if c is greater than d , swap elements c and d
lines.code: if ( c > d ) swap ( c , d ) ;

lines.text: if a is greater than b , swap elements a and b
lines.code: if ( a > b ) swap ( a , b ) ;

lines.text: if b is greater than c , swap elements b and c
lines.code: if ( b > c ) swap ( b , c ) ;

lines.text: if a is greater than b , swap elements a and b
lines.code: if ( a > b ) swap ( a , b ) ;

lines.text: if a + b is greater than c or a + b is greater than d or a + c is greater than d or b + c is greater than d
lines.code: if ( a + b > c || a + b > d || a + c > d || b + c > d )

lines.text: else if a + b is c or a + b is d or a + c is d or b + c is d
lines.code: else if ( a + b == c || a + b == d || a + c == d || b + c == d )
